thread.title: BBC World Service - Newsday, Is Bulawayo the worst city in Africa?
thread.title_full: BBC World Service - Newsday, Is Bulawayo the worst city in Africa?

title: BBC World Service - Newsday, Is Bulawayo the worst city in Africa?
text:
Follow us on Twitter Is Bulawayo the worst city in Africa? 
The Zimbabwean city of Bulawayo has been ranked as the lowest in Africa, in terms of housing, governance, infrastructure and the environment. The findings are contained in a survey carried out by the Swiss research institute, Ecole Polytechnique Federale de Lausanne. A social media entrepreneur from Bulawayo, Valentine Tusai, begs to differ on the outcome of the research. 
(Picture: General view of the England team playing a cricket tournament at The Queens Sports Club in Bulawayo in December 2004. Credit: Julian Herbert/Getty Images) Release date:
